title: Core Scientific Stock Surges On Acquisition Reports With CoreWeave
description:
Shares of Core Scientific Inc. (NASDAQ:CORZ) are up Thursday following a report suggesting CoreWeave inc. (NASDAQ:CRWV) is in discussions to acquire the bitcoin mining and hosting company.
What To Know: According to the Wall Street Journal, the two companies …
